column3: â€œGreat sativa effects leave me feeling uplifted and energetic.  The anti-inflammatory properties helped my Crohn's disease.  Also helped my mom with her MS pain.â€

â€œI purchased a gram of white dream from the Giving Tree Wellness center. . The effects I received were more towards the upper sativa side. The aroma of White dream is pungent and very sweet with beautiful trichs.â€

â€œI like the high from this bud,the taste is okay but not great.The feeling is energetic,yet relaxed at the same time.The taste is citrus,flowers,and earthy tea leafs,with a slight sweetness.Overall a pretty good strain,but not mind blowing in my opinion.â€

â€œleaning towards the sativa side. the batch I picked up from the wonderful people at greenhouse of flagstaff was chunky bright green with and abundance of trichomes and orange hair. smell and taste showcased the blue  dream in this strain in the best of ways. high was long lasted with great mind effects spacey yet energized. 10/10 would pick up againâ€

â€œTried this strain in shatter and ohhh man! Itâ€™s a great balanced, mellow high. Obviously definitely stronger than the flower! Only stating that because Iâ€™ve tried the flower and it wasnâ€™t so hot. This strain in shatter is the way to go if wanting to try this specific strain.â€

â€œI highly recommend Cloud 9 across town if you haven't been yet.
